title: Bloomberg Markets: Hurley on New Way to Live in Boston
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Hurley on New Way to Live in Boston
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Shawn Hurley President & CEO Skanska USA Commercial Development Discussing the continuing development of Boston's Seaport District.
